desc: Veteran Owned Business that uses all funds to help our Veterans directly. From Challenge Coins and T-shirts, to Fresh Roasted Coffee from our Plantation in Nicaragua, Brotherhood of the Blue Cord is by Veterans, for Veterans, to Help Veterans.

layout.text: Run by Veterans, for Veterans, to Help Veterans
All proceeds go to helping Veterans get back on their feet.
Any donations can be sent to alan@gruntcharities.us
